general.serviceName: Sign in to or create your GOV.UK One Login

phaseBanner.text: This is a new service – your feedback (opens in new tab) will help us to improve it.

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.heading: Cookies on GOV.UK One Login
cookieBanner.paragraph1: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookieBanner.paragraph2: We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.

cookeBannerAccept.paragraph1: You’ve accepted additional cookies. You can

cookeBannerReject.paragraph1: You’ve rejected additional cookies. You can

cookie.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler.

contentLicence.linkText: All content is available under the Open Government Licence v3.0, except where otherwise stated

content.paragraph1: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
content.paragraph2: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.

error500.title: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
error500.header: Sorry, there is a problem with the service

content.listItem1: have not used your GOV.UK One Login for more than 2 hours
content.listItem2: signed out of your GOV.UK One Login while using another service
content.paragraph2: We signed you out to keep your GOV.UK One Login and your information secure.
content.signInButtonText: Sign in to GOV.UK One Login

manageEmailSubscriptions.heading: GOV.UK email subscriptions
manageEmailSubscriptions.info: See and manage the emails you get about updates to pages on GOV.UK.

deleteAccount.heading: Delete your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccount.info: This will permanently delete your GOV.UK One Login. You’ll no longer be able to access the services you’ve used with it.

yourServices.title: Your services
yourServices.empty: You’re not using any services with your GOV.UK One Login yet.

informationBox.heading: About GOV.UK One Login
informationBox.paragraph1: GOV.UK One Login is new. At the moment you can only use it with:
informationBox.listItem1: Apply for a vehicle operator licence
informationBox.listItem2: Apply to become a registered social worker in England
informationBox.listItem4: LITE (Licensing for International Trade and Enterprise)
informationBox.paragraph2: GOV.UK One Login does not work with all government accounts and services yet (for example Government Gateway or Universal Credit).
informationBox.paragraph3: In the future, you'll be able to use GOV.UK One Login to access all services on GOV.UK.

changeEmail.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your email address.
changeEmail.backLink: I do not want to change my email address

changePassword.title: Enter your current password
changePassword.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your password.
changePassword.backLink: I do not want to change my password

changePhoneNumber.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can change your phone number.
changePhoneNumber.backLink: I do not want to change my phone number

deleteAccount.paragraph: We need to make sure it’s you before you can delete your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.backLink: I do not want to delete my GOV.UK One Login

validationError.length: Email address must be 256 characters or fewer
validationError.email: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
validationError.alreadyInUse: There’s already a GOV.UK One Login using that email address. Enter a different email address.
validationError.sameEmail: You are already using that email address. Enter a different email address.

dontWantTo.changeEmailLinkText: I do not want to change my email address

updateEmailConfirmation.title: You’ve changed your email address
updateEmailConfirmation.summaryText: Your email address has been changed to [email]

updatePhoneNumberConfirmation.title: You’ve changed your phone number
updatePhoneNumberConfirmation.summaryText: Your phone number has been changed to [mobile].

deleteAccountConfirmation.title: You’ve deleted your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccountConfirmation.panelText: You’ve deleted your GOV.UK One Login
deleteAccountConfirmation.summaryText: If you need to use a GOV.UK One Login in the future, you’ll have to create a new one.

changePassword.title: Enter your new password

password.label: Enter a new password
password.paragraph2: Do not use a very common password, such as ‘password’ or a sequence of numbers.

validationError.maxLength: Your password must be less than 256 characters
validationError.commonPassword: Enter a stronger password. Do not use very common passwords, such as ‘password’ or a sequence of numbers.
validationError.samePassword: You are already using that password. Enter a different password.
validationError.alphaNumeric: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and must include letters and numbers

validationError.matches: Enter the same password in both fields

securePasswordDetails.summary: How to create a secure password
securePasswordDetails.text: A good way to create a secure and memorable password is to use 3 random words. You can use numbers, symbols and spaces.

changePassword.backLink: I do not want to change my password

checkYourEmail.title: Check your email
checkYourEmail.text: We have sent an email to:

info.paragraph1: The email contains a 6 digit security code.
info.paragraph2: Your email might take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not get an email, check your spam folder.
info.paragraph3: The code will expire after 15 minutes.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you entered is not correct, or may have expired, try entering it again or request a new security code.

checkYourPhone.title: Check your phone
checkYourPhone.text: We have sent a code to [mobile].

info.paragraph: It might take a few minutes to arrive. The code will expire after  15 minutes.

details.text: We can send the code again or you can use a different phone number.

validationError.maxLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.minLength: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidFormat: Enter the security code using only 6 digits
validationError.invalidCode: The security code you entered is not correct, or may have expired, try entering it again or request a new security code.

deleteAccount.title: Are you sure you want to delete your GOV.UK One Login?
deleteAccount.header: Are you sure you want to delete your GOV.UK One Login?
deleteAccount.paragraph1: This will permanently delete the sign in details for your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.paragraph2: This means you’ll no longer be able to access the services you use with your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.paragraph3: If you have GOV.UK email subscriptions, these will also be deleted.
deleteAccount.paragraph4: It will not delete the personal information held by services you’ve used with your GOV.UK One Login.
deleteAccount.paragraph5: If you need a GOV.UK One Login in the future, you’ll have to create a new one.
deleteAccount.details: Deleting your GOV.UK One Login will not affect any other government accounts you may have, such as Government Gateway or Universal Credit.
deleteAccount.doNotDeleteAccount: Cancel and go back to settings

changePhoneNumber.title: Enter your new mobile phone number
changePhoneNumber.header: Enter your new mobile phone number

info.paragraph1: We will send a 6 digit security code to the number you give us.
info.paragraph2: You must use a UK mobile phone number.
info.backLink: I do not want to change my phone number

validationError.length: Enter a UK phone number, like 07700 900000
validationError.plusNumericOnly: Enter a UK mobile phone number using only numbers or the + symbol
validationError.samePhoneNumber: You are already using that phone number. Enter a different phone number.

internationalPhoneNumber.checkBoxLabel: I have an international mobile number
internationalPhoneNumber.label: International mobile number
internationalPhoneNumber.hint: Include the country code, for example +3537777666555

validationError.plusNumericOnly: Enter a phone number using only numbers or the + symbol
validationError.internationalFormat: Enter a phone number in the correct format

signedOut.title: You have signed out
signedOut.signInLinkText: sign in to your GOV.UK One Login

resendMfaCode.title: Get security code
resendMfaCode.message: Text messages can sometimes take a few minutes to arrive.

phoneNumber.insetText: We will send a code to [mobile]
phoneNumber.paragraph: Text messages can sometimes take a few minutes to arrive.

email.recipientMessage: We will send a code to:
email.paragraph: Your email might take a few minutes to arrive. If you do not get an email, check your spam folder.
